column4: I been providing support for hours this morning... what am I to do? ignore a greeting? lol
lets at least keep it friendly here
nothing wrong w/ that, it's only that folks who come up w/ a general greeting after a few lines of basically nonsense are usually bored kiddies looking for a chit-chat
Ok... reading over the recent chat. I don't see how what I said was harmful to support and singled out, compared to the other "OT" going on as I responded.
